General.Name: Charnic Capital Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Charnic Capital Tbk, an investment holding company, engages in the property business in Indonesia. It provides office building management and rental services; and invests in shares of public and non-public companies. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Charnic Capital Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Indovest Central.
